Text.val: 28.08.2014 JH SCR19096 Added dolumn INSP_BLOCKSELLDOWNDATE for output
19.11.2013 SH SCR18528 Added column INSP_FINANCE_PERC for output
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- Start producing XML File if no error occured (Transaction level)
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select SCPC_ADMNO, SCPC_CLNTNO from :1/SCPC where SCPC_NEW = 'N' and SCPC_TYPE = 3 and exists (select * from :1/SCPD where SCPD_ADMNO = SCPC_ADMNO and SCPD_CLNTNO = SCPC_CLNTNO and SCPD_DATE = ':2' and SCPD_INVESTMENT > 0) and not(exists (select * from :1/REPA where REPA_ADMNNO = SCPC_ADMNO and REPA_CLNTNO = SCPC_CLNTNO and REPA_DATE = ':2' and REPA_RPRT_TYPE = 'SCP')) for fetch only

Text.val: ... first add the XML header part to the final XML file
